hooks.command: ROOT="$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)" && : > "$ROOT/.claude/hooks/auto-rebuild.log" && if docker info > /dev/null 2>&1; then SCANNER=$(docker ps -q --filter name=infra-scanner-1 2>/dev/null); CONTROLLER=$(docker ps -q --filter name=infra-controller-1 2>/dev/null); if [ -z "$SCANNER" ] || [ -z "$CONTROLLER" ]; then cd "$ROOT" && npm run docker:dev > /dev/null 2>&1 & fi; fi
